description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use the lasers to zap the different colored orbs, but be careful not to zap yourself! Try to complete all of the challenges as you rave on.   ,~d[^__^]b┘┘
